backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining data types, access control, and user-scoped storage plus functions for profiles, commitments plans, and other recovery-related records.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old actor state to the new format by adding an empty commitmentsPlans map while preserving other maps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to their related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-generated summaries describing the purpose of key frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: TailwindCSS base style file defining color tokens, theme variables, and global styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Application router configuring all routes, authentication gating, profile setup flow, and layout structure.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity authentication and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal dialog prompting new users to enter their name and saving the profile through backend mutations.
frontend/src/components/checkins/CheckIn: Form for creating or updating today's check‑in, preloading existing data and submitting via mutation.
Displays 7‑ and 30‑day averages and trends for stress and work hours using check‑in history.
Main application layout with header, navigation tabs, footer, and user profile integration.
frontend/src/components/medications/Dose: Shows today's scheduled doses, their statuses, and allows logging taken, skipped, or late doses.
frontend/src/components/medications/Medi: Form for adding a new medication with dose, schedule times, instructions, and prescriber info.
frontend/src/components/meetings/Meeting: Form for logging a meeting with date, time, format, notes, and goals, submitted via mutation.
frontend/src/components/meetings/Sponsor: Displays sponsor contact notes from meetings, filtering and sorting them by date and rendering them in a styled card.
frontend/src/components/safety/Commitmen: Provides a form to view and edit a user's commitments plan with autosave indicators and mutation-based saving.
frontend/src/components/safety/Disclaime: Renders a list of safety and responsibility disclaimers with icons for emphasis.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, identity loading, and logout behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user data via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider contexts.
frontend/src/pages/AdherenceHistory.tsx: Displays medication adherence metrics for 7 and 30 days and groups dose logs by day with status badges.
frontend/src/pages/CheckIns.tsx: Shows daily check-ins with tabs for today, history grouped by month, and trend visualization.
frontend/src/pages/CrisisHelp.tsx: Provides crisis guidance, emergency resources, and an interface to manage emergency contacts.
frontend/src/pages/Landing.tsx: Landing page presenting app features, hero section, and navigation to login and crisis help.
frontend/src/pages/MedicationDetail.tsx: Displays detailed medication info including schedule, instructions, prescriber, and active status.
frontend/src/pages/Medications.tsx: Displays active and archived medications, provides stats and an add-medication dialog, and renders medication cards and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/Meetings.tsx: Shows meeting history and sponsor notes with tab navigation, sorted meeting logs, and a dialog to add new meetings.
frontend/src/pages/Onboarding.tsx: Guides users through a three‑step onboarding flow, collecting goals, work hours, and preferences before saving settings.
frontend/src/pages/Program.tsx: Lists recovery steps, shows completion progress, and lets users navigate into individual step details.
frontend/src/pages/ProgramStepDetail.tsx: Displays details for a single recovery step, shows existing reflections, and allows saving new reflections.
frontend/src/pages/Settings.tsx: Provides settings for reminders, data export, crisis help, and disclaimers, allowing updates to user preferences.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsDataExport.ts: Provides UI for exporting user data as JSON or a text summary, using export utilities and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/StayingSafeOutOfTroub: Renders a safety planning page with crisis resources, a pause-and-plan checklist, and a commitments editor.
frontend/src/pages/Today.tsx: Displays today's medication schedule, overdue/upcoming doses, and check-in status using user settings and queries.
frontend/src/utils/exporters.ts: Implements functions to export user data to downloadable JSON or a text-based summary file.
frontend/src/utils/reminders.ts: Calculates overdue and upcoming medication doses based on schedules, logs, and current time.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage support.
frontend/src/utils/userScopedStorage.ts: Manages loading, saving, and clearing per-user settings in localStorage with defaults.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom OKLCH-based theme extensions, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s state metadata and a list of existing features related to recovery, medication management, and user safety.
